markdown: ITC Limited REPORT AND ACCOUNTS 2013 Education & Stationery Products <::logo: Classmate classmate BECAUSE YOU ARE ONE OF A KIND The logo features the word "classmate" in a stylized font on a dark background, with a tagline below it and abstract gray geometric shapes to the right.::> India's No. 1 notebooks brand built on a meticulous understanding of consumer needs, Classmate's expanding portfolio today also includes pens, wood-cased & mechanical pencils, geometry box sets, erasers, sharpeners and scales. **Colour Crew**: The new brand of art stationery from Classmate that offers an exciting range of superior quality student art materials which includes non-toxic colour pencils, wax crayons and sketch pens. <::A collection of notebooks and pens. There are several notebooks of various sizes and designs, some spiral-bound and others with hardcovers. Many of the notebooks feature intricate patterns. In the foreground, two pens are visible, one black and silver, and the other all black.: figure::> <::A collection of stationery items, primarily branded "CLASSMATE". On the left, there are several notebooks, some open and some closed, with "CLASSMATE" prominently displayed on their covers. Some notebooks feature scenic images like mountains and a bird. In the foreground, there are three pencils, two pencil cases (one black, one clear), two erasers, two sharpeners, and a geometry box set. In the background, there are more packaged stationery items, including notebooks and possibly other school supplies.: figure::> Paperkraft Paperkraft is the leading provider of premium executive & office paper stationery including notebook ranges of Green Impression & Signature Series as well as an assortment of premium pens. Incense Sticks <::A collection of various brands and types of incense stick boxes, arranged in a semi-circular pattern. The boxes are rectangular, some are long and thin, while others are shorter and wider. They feature different designs and labels, suggesting a variety of fragrances or styles.::> With a diverse range of enchanting fragrances, Mangaldeep agarbattis are sourced from small-scale and cottage units, thereby providing livelihood opportunities for more than 14,000 rural women. # Matches ITC's range of safety matches includes popular brands like Aim, Aim Special, Aim Premium and i Kno to effectively address the needs of different consumer segments. The Safety Matches are sourced from small-scale units. <::logo: AIM SAFETY MATCHES The logo features a black and white target symbol with concentric circles::> Source: https://www.industrydocuments.ucsf.edu/docs/snbx0223

chunks.markdown: <::logo: Classmate classmate BECAUSE YOU ARE ONE OF A KIND The logo features the word "classmate" in a stylized font on a dark background, with a tagline below it and abstract gray geometric shapes to the right.::>

India's No. 1 notebooks brand built on a meticulous understanding of consumer needs, Classmate's expanding portfolio today also includes pens, wood-cased & mechanical pencils, geometry box sets, erasers, sharpeners and scales.

**Colour Crew**: The new brand of art stationery from Classmate that offers an exciting range of superior quality student art materials which includes non-toxic colour pencils, wax crayons and sketch pens.

<::A collection of notebooks and pens. There are several notebooks of various sizes and designs, some spiral-bound and others with hardcovers. Many of the notebooks feature intricate patterns. In the foreground, two pens are visible, one black and silver, and the other all black.: figure::>

<::A collection of stationery items, primarily branded "CLASSMATE". On the left, there are several notebooks, some open and some closed, with "CLASSMATE" prominently displayed on their covers. Some notebooks feature scenic images like mountains and a bird. In the foreground, there are three pencils, two pencil cases (one black, one clear), two erasers, two sharpeners, and a geometry box set. In the background, there are more packaged stationery items, including notebooks and possibly other school supplies.: figure::>
Paperkraft Paperkraft is the leading provider of premium executive & office paper stationery including notebook ranges of Green Impression & Signature Series as well as an assortment of premium pens.

Incense Sticks <::A collection of various brands and types of incense stick boxes, arranged in a semi-circular pattern. The boxes are rectangular, some are long and thin, while others are shorter and wider. They feature different designs and labels, suggesting a variety of fragrances or styles.::>
With a diverse range of enchanting fragrances, Mangaldeep agarbattis are sourced from small-scale and cottage units, thereby providing livelihood opportunities for more than 14,000 rural women.

# Matches ITC's range of safety matches includes popular brands like Aim, Aim Special, Aim Premium and i Kno to effectively address the needs of different consumer segments. The Safety Matches are sourced from small-scale units.
<::logo: AIM SAFETY MATCHES The logo features a black and white target symbol with concentric circles::>
